Cherrycake\Modules\Locale::convertTimestamp

convertTimestamp

Converts a given timestamp from one timezone to another. The passed $timestamp is considered to be in $toTimezone, the equivalent timestamp for the given $toTimezone is returned

    Signature

    public function convertTimestamp(integer $timestamp, [boolean $toTimeZone = false, [boolean $fromTimeZone = false]] )

    Parameters

    $timestamp — integer
    The timestamp to convert. Expected to be in the given $fromTimezone. The default cherrycake TIMEZONE configuration is considered as $fromTimezone if not specified (Usually Etc/UTC)
    $toTimeZone — boolean
    The desired timezone, one of the PHP constants as specified in http://php.net/manual/en/timezones.php. If none specified, the current Locale timezone is used.
    $fromTimeZone — boolean
    The timezone on which the given $timestamp is considered to be in. If not specified the default cherrycake TIMEZONE configuration is used. (Usually Etc/UTC)


    Returns

    integer
    The converted timestamp
